name: OR_LOG_NURSE_NOTES
description: Use OR_LOG_NURS_NOTES table instead of this. The OR_LOG_NURSE_NOTES table contains OR management system log nursing notes in free-text. This table will be discontinued in future.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the surgical log the nursing notes refer to.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the nursing notes in the surgical log.

columns.name: NURSING_NOTES
columns.description: The free text nursing notes in the surgical log.
